name: growchief
tagline: An API driven tool for automating social media outreach and follow ups
description: GrowChief is an API based tool to automate your social media accounts such as sending connection requests and follow-up messages. Perfect for n8n / Make / Zapier users

features.title: Customer Engagement Automation
features.description: Send automated messages to users across supported channels

features.title: Campaign Management
features.description: Create and manage engagement campaigns from a web interface

features.title: User Segmentation
features.description: Group users based on defined attributes and behavior

features.title: Message Templates
features.description: Reuse predefined templates for outbound messages

features.title: Scheduling
features.description: Schedule campaigns to run at specific times

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the engagement platform on your own infrastructure
